extension.summary: Odroid N2 service for controlling an oled display
extension.description: Odroid N2 Service for controlling a 128x64 or 128x32 i2c oled display using either the SH1106 or SSD1306 driver chip.
extension.disclaimer: WARNING:- Incorrectly wiring any device to your Odroid N2's GPIO can cause permanent damage, the author of this addon accepts no responsibility for damage caused.
